title: Drift & Stress Testing: Evidence‑Led Stability in Regulated AI
summary: Design drift/stress suites and report effect sizes so risk teams can accept models.
bodyMd:
## Why
Drift and instability derail regulated AI. Measure sensitivity and report evidence.

## Tests
- Time drift (weekly/monthly windows)
- Domain shifts (product/segment)
- Corruptions (vision/text)
- Fault injection (dropout/jitter)

## Reporting
Effect sizes, CIs, and fail‑closed rules in the evidence bundle.
